properties.areaDesc: Waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 4 at 4:10AM CST until January 4 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS
MORNING...

.High pressure continues to build into the region as winds are
gradually tapering off. This process will continue through the
day.

* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA from 20 to
60 NM and Waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal
City LA from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 4 AM through 9 AM this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING
